messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to the actions of this station, an appropriate Emergency Shuttle will be sent when called.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to an influx of bluespace activity, certain rare and valuable items may have appeared around your station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: High levels of soap detected near station. Shuttle call is advised.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Dangerous hostile lifeforms detected in: CENTRAL HALLWAY. Action advised.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Please note: One of our FUN INSPECTORS has just arrived on your station!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We apologise for the failure of our inspector. We hope you enjoy our complementary escape shuttle, when needed.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Dangerously high levels of fun detected. Shuttle call is advised. 

Source: Bar

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A moment of silence for our fallen drone comrades.
